Posts.Title: Oncotype score - CHEMO? dm2573 dm2573

Posts.Content: dm2573 wrote: I am interested in knowing if others who have a similar diagnosis to mine were advised by their medical oncologists to have chemo.  I have had 2 opinions which were totally opposite.  One doctor  strongly advised chemo and the other felt it was definitely not worth the risks.  Of course, I'd rather NOT have chemo, but don't want to be stupid either!  Current treatment plan includes 6 weeks of radiation and Femara.  Thanks. Age:  54, Menopausal, IDC, 1 cm, ER greater then 90% +, PR +, neg nodes, HER2/neg, clear margins, Oncotype score 20,  Gade 2 Log in to post a reply
